data.DescriptionHtml: This spell functions like conjure ice beast I, except that you can conjure one creature from the 8th-level list, two creatures of the same kind from the 7th-level list, or four creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.
data.Effect: One or more conjured ice creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
data.Name: Conjure Ice Beast Viii
